actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to require recipients of grants through the Department of Housing and Urban Development to promptly pay contractors for performing federally assisted work.

summary.text: Amends the Department of Housing and Urban Development Act to require Department of Housing and Urban Development grant recipients to pay contractors promptly for performing federally assisted work.

titles.title: A bill to require recipients of grants through the Department of Housing and Urban Development to promptly pay contractors for performing federally assisted work.
